title: Sulfasalazine-Induced Crystalluria Causing Severe Acute Kidney Injury.
journal: American journal of kidney diseases : the official journal of the National Kidney Foundation

title: Continuous duodenal levodopa infusion in a patient with Crohn's disease and small bowel surgery - Case report.
Decreased availability of intestinal dopamine in transmural colitis may relate to inhibitory effects of interferon-gamma upon L-DOPA uptake.
